author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: Coronavirus: CDC study suggests Covid-19 could live on bottom of shoes
description: Covid-19 also detected in air up to 13 feet from patients, study says
content:
New research has suggested that coronavirus can live on the soles of shoes and consequently could be being transported around hospitals by medical staff.
The study, published by the Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, noted that half of the samples f… [+2404 chars]
